plot: The cast reunites after Season 1 of Jersey Shore to discuss the summer in Seaside Heights.

The cast reunites after Season 1 of Jersey Shore to discuss the summer in Seaside Heights. Things get intense when never-before-seen footage leaves Ronnie and Sammi's relationship in question. Mike "The Situation" faces backlash from the cast regarding his cockiness, Angelina discusses her decision to leave the show early, and JWoww clears up her controversial moments from the summer. Pauly D, Vinny and Snooki each also have their time in the spotlight.—Chris
